keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.

map <c-p> previousTab
map <c-n> nextTab
map d removeTab
map u restoreTab

map J scrollPageDown
map K scrollPageUp

map Y LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
map t Vomnibar.activateInNewTab

map gr createTab https://feedly.com/i/latest
map gm createTab https://mail.google.com/
map gd createTab https://drive.google.com/
map gga createTab https://analytics.google.com/analytics/web/
map gt createTab https://twitter.com/
map gk createTab https://spinners.kibe.la/
map gg createTab https://github.com/
map gn createTab https://github.com/notifications?query=is%3Aunread
map ga createTab https://www.amazon.co.jp/
searchEngines:
# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant

g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
a: https://www.amazon.co.jp/s?k=%s Amazon
k: https://spinners.kibe.la/search?query=%s Kibela
